title: FS: t206 Davis and White HINDU backs!
author: jimivintage

posts.post_title: FS: t206 Davis and White HINDU backs!
posts.post_content:
Hey guys,

Two very nice SGC graded Hindu backs available tonight, especially the Davis.

T206 H. Davis HINDU SGC 30 (gorgeous back!)  $375
T206 D. White HINDU SGC 10 (small paper loss on back, but you can read everything!) $175

Prices include shipping.  Much thanks!  More to come soon!

Jimi
